name: REBU'BLOCKS
description:
REBU'BLOCKS!

I'm finally done with this game

I've started making this game since late 2021

but its here! I would like to give some credits.

me for making the game

JSAB for inspiration

Cookie Clicker also for inspiration

OST

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLEOIdc6ZECmUlNMORBbPj3I6Odqy11dEc

tell me if there's bugs so I can fix them.

try to find all secrets

ORIGINAL VERSION ( don't play )

https://scratch.mit.edu/prSCojects/617340409/

NEWGROUNDS VERSION

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/859802

HOW TO PLAY REBU'BLOCKS!

Q for text

W to move forwards

S to move backwards

up down left right for emotes

and 1234567890 keys to move to levels

PRESS X I DARE YOU

V1.0 - V1.5
